content: {"locationId": "12430", "organizationId": "9778", "name": "Donley County Senior Citizens", "address1": "115 E 4th", "address2": "", "city": "Clarendon", "state": "TX", "zipCode": "79226.0", "country": null, "phone": "806-874-2665", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "34.9357166", "longitude": "-100.8889754", "foodPrograms": "Hot/Cold Meal Program", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Mission Statement:     To provide nutritious meals and a place to socialize to senior citizens and disabled in Donley County Texas at no charge.  Hot meals are delivered to homebound seniors and disabled.  In house dining for senior citizens, their friends and families.  Donations are accepted and appreciated. ", "notes": "", "contactName": "Denise Bertrand", "contactPhone": "806-874-2665", "contactEmail": "donleycountysrcitizen@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Home Delivery Service", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 80, "regionName": "High Plains Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "2a1634a4-d934-4b45-8091-1d7a4afda60f.png", "website": "https://www.hpfb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Monday 11:30 AM-1:00 PM", "Tuesday 11:30 AM-1:00 PM", "Wednesday 11:30 AM-1:00 PM", "Thursday 11:30 AM-1:00 PM", "Friday 11:30 AM-1:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": [{"locationSpecialHoursId": 9164, "locationId": 12430, "specialDate": "2025-09-01T00:00:00", "startTime": null, "endTime": null, "startTimeDescr": null, "endTimeDescr": null, "closedInd": true, "notes": "Labor Day", "addDateTime": "2025-05-12T21:50:39.47", "addUserName": "donleycountysrcitizen@gmail.com", "updateDateTime": null, "updateUserName": null}]}
